SA15sbpramvu:2214: tad vyomakusumādi asad iti kathaṃ kena pramāṇenāvagantavyaṃ yenaivaṃ syāt* /
SA15sbpramvu:2215: anupalaabdher liṅgād abhāve sādhye dṛṣṭāntaḥ syād ity arthaḥ /
SA15sbpramvu:2219: athātrāpy aparo dṛṣṭāntas tasyā vyomakusumādyasattāsiddheḥ sadṛṣṭāntatve vānavasthāprasaṃgaḥ /
SA15sbpramvu:2220: tatrāpy aparo dṛṣṭāntas tatrāpy aparo 'pīti kṛtvā /
SA15sbpramvu:2221: tathā cānavasthāyāṃ satyāṃ ekasyāpi siddhāv apratipattiḥ /
SA15sbpramvu:2224: .. labdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya anupalabdher ityādāv api prayoge dṛṣṭāntānapekṣaṇād ananumānam anupalabdhiḥ /
SA15sbpramvu:2226: sakṛd uktaṃ yathā svabhāvānupalabdhau nābhāvaḥ sādhyate kiṃtu abhāvavyavahāra iti tacchṛṇvann api /
SA15sbpramvu:2227: mūrkhasya trīṇi nāmāni devo divyaḥ prajayatir ity ato devānāṃ mūrkhāṇāṃ pri .. ///
SA15sbpramvu:2232: sā nimittaṃ kāraṇaṃ sadvyavahārāṇāṃ sānupalabdhiḥ svasannidhānād ātmanā sannidhānāt* /
